product_name: CatEye SR-2S/L Fizik Saddle Light Bracket
long_description: The Cateye SR-2S/L Fizik Saddle Light Bracket fits all Fizik saddles with the Fizik ICS (Integrated Clip System) technology and offers a spot to clip your CatEye Rapid 1, 3 or 5 taillight. Clip a CatEye Rapid 1, 3, or 5 taillight (sold separately) into the bracket and insert in the back of the saddle for a clean, seamless look. Comes with both the long and short bracket to fit all Fizik ICS saddles.
short_description: The Cateye SR-2S/L Fizik Saddle Light Bracket fits all Fizik saddles with the Fizik ICS (Integrated Clip System) technology and offers a spot to clip your CatEye Rapid 1, 3 or 5 taillight.
